channel.title: XenDesktop on Steven Lemonier
channel.description: Recent content in XenDesktop on Steven Lemonier

item.title: Export and Import On-Prem Citrix Site configuration
item.description: Disclaimer: as always, you should not run any script from someone you don’t know in your production environment, especially if you’re not able to understand every single line of code you execute. Run it in a safe (e.g. dev) environment first, run your tests and if it sounds ok, run another bunch of tests. Recently, I had to update a Citrix Site from 7.15 to 1912 with a lot of catalogs, desktop groups and more than a hundred published apps (along with file type associations and so on).
